title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the surprising decision by the Jaguars owner Shad Kahn to fire Urban Meyer after only 13 games into his NFL career and why Meyer struggled to transition from his successful career in college. He argues Justin Herbert should be considered as good as Patrick Mahomes right now despite not winning a Super Bowl. He discusses the latest round of issues for the Cleveland Browns and why losing organizations always find themselves in these situations. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to tell Colin what makes Matthew Stafford and the Rams offense so special. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
